extension.summary: Simply plays live Irish TV (RTE1, RTE2, TV3, TG4, UTV, Irish TV, RTE News and Oireachtas TV)
extension.description: I just want a simple kodi addon that plays live irish tv (and works) and so I made one myself, my first addon :)
extension.disclaimer: I do work with or am affiliated with any of the websites shown in this addon this addon simply provides links to video streams which are on the web already. I have no ownership or responsiblity over said video streams.
